BG.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
BG.description: The original NES™ adventures of Ryu Hayabusa conclude with Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. Falsely accused of murder, Ryu must battle through seven action-packed stages to clear his name. Armed with his trusty sword and ninja power, Ryu can now grab platforms and pipes to perform swift attacks on enemies from above or below. You’ll need all of Ryu’s skills at your disposal to defeat the forces of evil and uncover the true culprit.

AU.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
AU.description: The original NES™ adventures of Ryu Hayabusa conclude with Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. Falsely accused of murder, Ryu must battle through seven action-packed stages to clear his name. Armed with his trusty sword and ninja power, Ryu can now grab platforms and pipes to perform swift attacks on enemies from above or below. You’ll need all of Ryu’s skills at your disposal to defeat the forces of evil and uncover the true culprit.

AT.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
AT.description: Die Originalabenteuer von Ryu Hayabusa finden auf dem NES ihren Abschluss mit Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. Fälschlich des Mordes bezichtigt, muss Ryu sich durch sieben actionreiche Level kämpfen, um seinen Namen reinzuwaschen. Mit seinem treuen Schwert und seinen Ninjakräften kann Ryu nun Plattformen und Rohre packen und seine Gegner schnell von oben oder unten angreifen. Du wirst Ryus ganzes Können brauchen, um die Mächte des Bösen zu besiegen und den wahren Schuldigen zu finden.

BE.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
BE.description: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom marque la fin des aventures de Ryu Hayabusa sur NES™. Accusé à tort de meurtre, Ryu doit se battre au fil de sept niveaux à l'action palpitante pour laver son honneur. Armé de son fidèle sabre et du pouvoir ninja, Ryu peut désormais grimper sur des plateformes et saisir des tuyaux pour attaquer en un éclair ses ennemis. Vous aurez besoin de tout le savoir-faire de Ryu pour venir à bout des forces du mal et découvrir le véritable coupable.

NL.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
NL.description: Het oorspronkelijke NES™-avontuur van Ryu Hayabusa wordt afgesloten met Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. Vals beschuldigd van moord moet Ryu zich door zeven levels boordevol actie knokken om zijn naam te zuiveren. Gewapend met zijn vertrouwde zwaard en ninjakrachten kan Ryu zich nu ook vastgrijpen aan platformen en buizen om zo zijn vijanden van boven of beneden te verrassen met snelle aanvalsacties. Je zult alle vaardigheden van Ryu in de strijd moeten gooien om het kwaad te bestrijden en de echte boosdoener te ontmaskeren.

PT.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
PT.description: As aventuras originais de Ryu Hayabusa para a NES™ tiveram a sua conclusão com Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. Acusado erradamente de homicídio, Ryu terá de lutar por entre sete níveis repletos de ação para limpar o seu nome. Armado com a sua fiel espada e com poderes de ninja, Ryu pode também agora agarrar-se a plataformas e tubos para atacar os seus inimigos com maior rapidez quer por baixo quer por cima. Precisarás de todas as habilidades de Ryu para derrotares as forças do mal e desvendar quem é o verdadeiro culpado.

NZ.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
NZ.description: The original NES™ adventures of Ryu Hayabusa conclude with Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. RU.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
RU.description: Игра Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom завершает приключение Ryu Hayabusa на NES™. Несправедливо обвиненный в убийстве, Ryu должен пройти семь уровней динамичного экшна и многое преодолеть, чтобы вернуть себе доброе имя. В арсенале Ryu — не раз выручавший его меч и сила ниндзя. Главный герой может молниеносно атаковать врагов сверху или снизу с помощью трубы или платформы. Используйте все способности Ryu, чтобы наказать зло и выйти на след настоящего убийцы.

SE.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
SE.description: The original NES™ adventures of Ryu Hayabusa conclude with Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. ES.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
ES.description: Las aventuras de Ryu Hayabusa en la consola NES™ llegan a su fin con Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. En esta ocasión, Ryu ha sido acusado de un asesinato que no ha cometido y deberá completar siete niveles repletos de acción para limpiar su nombre. Además de contar con su fiel espada y su poder ninja, ahora Ryu puede agarrarse a las plataformas y tuberías para realizar veloces ataques desde arriba y desde abajo. Tendrás que poner a prueba todas las habilidades de Ryu para derrotar a las fuerzas del mal y descubrir al verdadero culpable.

ZA.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
ZA.description: The original NES™ adventures of Ryu Hayabusa conclude with Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. Falsely accused of murder, Ryu must battle through seven action-packed stages to clear his name. Armed with his trusty sword and ninja power, Ryu can now grab platforms and pipes to perform swift attacks on enemies from above or below. You’ll need all of Ryu’s skills at your disposal to defeat the forces of evil and uncover the true culprit.

HU.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom

You’ll need all of Ryu’s skills at your disposal to defeat the forces of evil and uncover the true culprit.

IT.name: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom
IT.description: Le avventure di Ryu Hayabusa per NES™ si concludono con Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. Accusato ingiustamente di omicidio, Ryu deve superare ben sette livelli ricchi di azione per difendere il proprio onore. Armato della sua inseparabile spada e della forza ninja, Ryu può ora lanciarsi da tubi e piattaforme per sorprendere i nemici con veloci attacchi sia dal basso che dall'alto. Per sconfiggere le forze del male e scoprire il vero colpevole dovrai sfruttare tutte le abilità di Ryu a disposizione.

LT.description: The original NES™ adventures of Ryu Hayabusa conclude with Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom.
